Terms of Service

Clear and fair terms for using LocalPDF

Last Updated: January 15, 2025

📋Introduction

Welcome to LocalPDF, the privacy-first PDF processing platform. These Terms of Service govern your use of our free, open-source PDF tools that process files entirely within your browser for maximum security and privacy.

✅Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using LocalPDF, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

🛠️Service Description

LocalPDF provides free, browser-based PDF processing tools including merge, split, compress, convert, and edit functionality. All processing happens locally in your browser without file uploads.

Our Tools Include:

  • • PDF Merge - Combine multiple PDFs into one
  • • PDF Split - Extract pages or divide documents
  • • PDF Compress - Reduce file size while maintaining quality
  • • Word to PDF - Convert documents to PDF format
  • • Add Text & Watermarks - Customize your documents
  • • Image Conversion - Convert between PDF and image formats
  • • OCR Text Recognition - Extract text from scanned documents
  • • And more privacy-focused PDF tools

⚖️Usage Rules

✅You May:

  • • Use all tools for personal and commercial purposes
  • • Process unlimited files and file sizes
  • • Access the service from any device or browser
  • • Contribute to the open-source project on GitHub
  • • Fork and modify the code under our license
  • • Use offline when previously loaded

❌You Must Not:

  • • Upload malicious files or malware
  • • Attempt to reverse engineer our processing algorithms
  • • Use the service for illegal activities
  • • Try to overload or attack our infrastructure
  • • Violate any applicable laws or regulations
  • • Infringe on intellectual property rights

🔒Privacy & Data Protection

LocalPDF processes all files locally in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

We do not collect, store, or have access to your files or personal data. See our Privacy Policy for complete details.

Read our complete Privacy Policy →

💎Intellectual Property

Open Source License

LocalPDF is open-source software available under the MIT license. You are free to use, modify, and distribute the code.

View source code on GitHub →

Your Content

You retain all rights to files you process with LocalPDF. Since processing happens locally, we never access your content.

⚠️Disclaimers

LocalPDF is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.

While we strive for reliability, we cannot guarantee uninterrupted service or error-free operation.

  • • Service availability may vary based on browser compatibility
  • • Processing speed depends on your device capabilities
  • • Large files may cause performance issues on older devices
  • • We are not responsible for file corruption or data loss

🛡️Limitation of Liability

LocalPDF and its developers shall not be liable for any damages arising from use of the service.

Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

We may update these terms occasionally. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

Continued use of LocalPDF after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.
